articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Published in Romania
articles.content:
10th Meeting of Executive Council of ARIJI Held 
    Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The 10th Meeting of the Executive Council of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea which opened on November 1 was closed in Dacca on December 4.
 The meeting reviewed the activities of the institute after the 9th meeting of its executive council and discussed the issues of newly defining its future tasks and the mission of members.    
 The meeting discussed the organizational issue and elected Garib Newaz director general of the institute.

articles.title: Personal Letter to Kim Jong Il
Support to DPRK Called for
articles.content:
Personal Letter to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a personal letter from Indonesian President Megawati Soekarnoputri.
 The letter was handed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by Nana Sutresna, councilor to the Indonesian president who is a special envoy of the president, on a visit to the DPRK on Dec. 11.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Vietnamese Delegation
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Head of EU Troika Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Vietnamese Delegation 
    Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the delegation of the Vietnam-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group on a visit to the DPRK.
 The gift was handed to Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, from Trang A Pao, chairman of the National Council of the Vietnamese National Assembly and chairman of the group, who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Special Envoy of Indonesian President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Head of EU Troika Delegation 
    Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the head of the Troika delegation of the European Union on a visit to the DPRK.
 The gift was handed to Paek Nam Sun, minister of Foreign Affairs, by Guido Martini, director general of the Italian Foreign Ministry, who is heading the delegation on Dec. 11.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Vietnamese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Special Envoy of Indonesian President 
    Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the special envoy of the Indonesian president on a visit to the DPRK.
 The gift was handed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by Nana Sutresna, councilor to the Indonesian president who is a special envoy of the president, on Dec. 11.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Vietnamese Delegation 
    Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Vietnam-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group headed by Trang A Pao, chairman of the National Council of the Vietnamese National Assembly who is chairman of the group, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Dec. 11.
 Present there were Ryang Kyong Bok, chairman of the Korea-Vietnam Friendship Parliamentary Group who is deputy to the SPA, and Do Thi Hoa, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Special Envoy of Indonesian President
    Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly conversation with Nana Sutresna, councilor to the president of the Republic of Indonesia who is a special envoy of the president and his companion at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on December 11.
 Present there were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned and Barita Siburian, Indonesian charge d'affaires ad interim here.

articles.title: Congratulations to Prime Minister of Grenada
articles.content:
DPRK Football Team Proves Successful
    Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK men's football team won a gold medal by beating the Egyptian team 3:2 in the final at the 3rd World Military Games held in southern Italy on December 11.

articles.title: EU Troika Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Congratulations to Prime Minister of Grenada
    Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju sent a congratulatory message to Keith Mitchell upon his reassumption of office as prime minister of Grenada.
 The message expressed the conviction that the friendly relations between the two countries would as ever favorably develop and sincerely wished him and the people of Granada great success in their work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Company
articles.content:
EU Troika Delegation Leaves
    Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Troika delegation of the European Union led by Guido Martini, director general of the Italian Foreign Ministry, left here today.
 It was seen off by officials concerned and Swedish, German, British and Polish diplomatic envoys here.
